commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Update <kbd class='tabTrigger'>alert⇥</kbd> snippet to avoid deprecated API

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Update platform symbols using the macOS 10.12 SDK

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.body: These are updated both to use new TextMate features (like multiple choice menus for types) and Objective-C features (like assuming ARC and returning instancetype from initializer).

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.body:
The current code was sorting on the filter string, but for methods with multiple arguments, the filter string does not contain the parameter names even though they are part of the display string.

The code to prune duplicates may have worked, but it assumed a sorted list, which was not always the case.

I moved sorting to the show_dialog function and made a (syntactically) simpler uniq function.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Always place functions in the grammar repository
commits.body:
Currently the C and Objective-C grammars expect the functions to be in the repository for the C platform functions but not the Objective-C platform functions, this is a little inconsistent, so since having the functions in the repository is the most flexible, this is what we choose.

This commit also include the required change to the Objective-C grammar.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Add the code used to generate Platform.tmLanguage

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.body: We now include `Platform.md` so that it’s easier to see what changed since last generation (mainly to ensure we are not missing symbols or similar).

commits.author: Jason Wray
commits.summary: Add `nullable` and `nonnull` to property keyword list
